pkgmetadata.longdescription: Apache OpenNLP Tools Interface // An interface to the Apache OpenNLP tools (version 1.5.3). The Apache OpenNLP library is a machine learning based toolkit for the processing of natural language text written in Java. It supports the most common NLP tasks, such as tokenization, sentence segmentation, part-of- speech tagging, named entity extraction, chunking, parsing, and coreference resolution. See http://opennlp.apache.org/ for more information.
